title: My computer freezes whenever i enter a game or loading screen plz help!!!!!
body: Every time I enter a LOL game or loading screen since the latest patch to enter the newest arcade skins my pc will freeze and force me to restart it. I have already tried reinstalling and cannot think of another immediate solution. Open for possible fixes. Thx

replies.body: A few players have reported freezing after the game has loaded, and it appears to be an issue with a recent Windows 10 update.  Specifically, it looks like the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is not playing nice with League.  Disabling it should fix this up!
What about for us mac users?
awesome to see officials answering and helping fellow summoners

> [{quoted}](name=FeArXTricksS,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Z8Q5aAA9,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-26T05:30:28.330+0000)
>
> Every time I enter a LOL game or loading screen since the latest patch to enter the newest arcade skins my pc will freeze and force me to restart it. I have already tried reinstalling and cannot think of another immediate solution. Open for possible fixes. Thx

I found a way to fix it but I still thing they should take away my low priority queues.
the way to fix it is u right click on lol shortcut>go to properties>compatibility>tick run this program in compatibility mode for windows 7>apply
note this works for all windows users 7,8,8.1,10
i did what you told me to do, but when i clicked on the compatibility mode, there's no mode for windows 10, what should i do
my pc did the same thing and now I have lost 20 and got 5 low priority queue what must I do my lol still don't work
Your not the only one man I'm reinstalling right now but u said doesn't work so idk hopefully we both get a solution but if not I hope reinstalling works for me Xd
ya idk i think they might come out with a hot fix a friend of mine had the same issue
Hopefully I need to try tanksuo  Xd
